descript.purpose: Show all monitoring stations used in the 2010 Virginia 305(b)/303(d) Water Quality Assessment Integrated Report.
descript.supplinf: This dataset is supplemental GIS data to the 2010 Virginia 305(b)/303(d) Water Quality Assessment Integrated Report, the 2010 Assessment Unit hydrology geodatabse (va_10ir_aus_all.mdb) and the regionally significant VPDES facilities shapefile (va_10ir_vpdes_facilities.shp).

idinfo.useconst: Point locations and attributes should not be altered except by the developer (VA DEQ). This dataset constitutes the EPA approved digital version of the suite of all monitoring sites used in the current water quality assessment for Virginia. Crediting the Virginia Department of Environmental Quality as data source is requested.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcGIS 9.2.6.1500

procstep.procdesc: Compiled regional Microsoft Access 2003 databases (ir_mon_stations_2010_<Regional Office>.mdb into one statewide database.
Established multiple SQL queries to check for general errors in data entry.
Per the results of SQL QA and regional input, values were updated where necessary. Records were deleted or appended if necessary.
Exported select fields from tbl_ir_mon_stations to XY point layer.
Executed Identity command to populate the VAHU61 and MAP from vanwbd_v3_1247.shp to verify geocoding accuracy of WATERSHED and VAHU6 values entered by regional staff.
Compared the output of station location to assessment unit layers and DRGs to verify accuracy of the lat/long coordinates entered by regional staff.
Updated Access table with any revisions needed from/requested by regional staff.
Created a copy of the master database to edit for shapefile creation.
Created make table query in Access database to export a table with modified field headings to conform to dBase IV field name, type and size restrictions.
Imported final revisions from Access table to ArcMap.
Created XY shapefile from Access table of DEC_LAT and DEC_LONG values.

Added ASSESSED to populate whether at least one sample parameter had a pass or fail assessment status. Added DEQ_STA field to populate whether DEQ was the data owner/provider. Added MAPSTATYPE to categorize values in STATYPE1, STATYPE2 and STATYPE3 as one mapping code. Populated MAP and BASIN_NAME values from deq_basins.shp based on the station's spatial location.
Dataset copied to 2010 assessment folder for use in statistical calculations and mapping for the current assessment cycle.
Metadata txt file revised and imported using Metadata Import utility in ArcCatalog.

edom.edomvd: a feature with one coordinate pair and no length or area at any given scale

edom.edomv: not blank; see STATYPE1 for possible values. In order to capture all applicable monitoring activities at this station this field can contain multiple station types separated by a comma.
